entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as the location where Harry and Mr. Weasley are currently at. It is described as having enchanted windows that show a controlled weather, and it has various departments such as Auror Headquarters.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, who is being accompanied by Mr. Weasley through the Ministry of Magic. He asks questions and observes his surroundings.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a character who is accompanying Harry through the Ministry of Magic. He explains the enchanted windows and introduces Harry to various departments such as Auror Headquarters.

entities.name: auror headquarters
entities.description: Auror Headquarters is a department within the Ministry of Magic, mentioned in the story. It is described as being located in a cubicle and having memos zooming in and out.
